name: Project Slime (dargbeast)
description:
You control a sentient alien creature made from slime which must escape its collapsing home world. Use W, A, S and D to control your slime. You must make it to the end of each level with 5 or more slime cubes to complete it.  

This game was created as part of the OpenGameArt’s Game Jam 2022.

This is the first game that I have made in Unity, so I hope it’s good.

 

The 6 resources from OGA (all can also be found in the in-game credit screen):

1 (Art)

Title: 100 Seamless Textures

Author: Mitch Featherston

URL: https://opengameart.org/content/100-seamless-textures

Licence(s): CC0 (https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)
